item.description:
Since we are making an effort to have events all over our lovely state we have a few people to have volunteered to host events for us in various locations. Kate Ramsdell has offered to host a trivia meetup in Salem, Ma. O'Neils is the place and I believe trivia starts at around 8:00 but the food is pretty good so how about we meet at 7:00 for some food, drinks and conversation before the trivia begins!

Let's see if we can get a Trivia North group going!

Judie
item.how_to_find_us: Kate is hosting and she will be looking out for you!
item.name: Trivia North
